sx.blah.discord.api

Interface IDiscordClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiscordClientImpl

    public interface IDiscordClient
    Represents the main discord api.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeAvatar(Image avatar)
      Changes this client's account's avatar.
      void changePresence(boolean isIdle)
      Changes this user's presence on all shards.

      Changes the status of the bot user on all shards.
      void changeUsername(String username)
      Changes this client's account's username.

      Gets the bot's application's client id.

      Gets the bot's application's owner.

    • Method Detail

      • getDispatcher

        EventDispatcher getDispatcher()
        Gets the EventDispatcher instance for this client. Use this to handle events.
        Returns:
        The event dispatcher instance.

      • getModuleLoader

        ModuleLoader getModuleLoader()
        Gets the ModuleLoader instance for this client.
        Returns:
        The module loader instance.

      • getShards

        List<IShard> getShards()
        Gets the list of shards this client manages.
        Returns:
        The shards.

      • getShardCount

        int getShardCount()
        Gets the total number of shards this client manages. Purely for convenience.
        Returns:
        The shard count.

      • getToken

        String getToken()
        Gets the authorization token for this client.
        Returns:
        The authorization token.

      • login

        void login()
    throws DiscordException,
           RateLimitException
        Logs in every shard this client manages.
        Throws:
        DiscordException - This is thrown if there is an error logging in.
        RateLimitException

      • logout

        void logout()
     throws DiscordException
        Logs out every shard this client manages.
        Throws:
        DiscordException

        Parameters:

        DiscordException

      • changePresence

        void changePresence(boolean isIdle)
        Changes this user's presence on all shards.
        Parameters:
        isIdle - If true, this user becomes idle, or online if false.

      • changeStatus

        void changeStatus(Status status)
        Changes the status of the bot user on all shards.
        Parameters:
        status - The new status to use.

      • isReady

        boolean isReady()
        Checks if the api is ready to be interacted with on all shards.
        Returns:
        True if ready, false if otherwise.
        See Also:
        IShard.isReady()

      • isLoggedIn

        boolean isLoggedIn()
        Checks if the api has established a connection with the Discord gateway on all shards.
        Returns:
        True if logged in, false if otherwise.
        See Also:
        IShard.isLoggedIn()

      • getOurUser

        IUser getOurUser()
        Gets the User this bot is representing.
        Returns:
        The user object.

      • getChannels

        List<IChannel> getChannels(boolean includePrivate)
        Gets a set of all channels visible to the bot user.
        Parameters:
        includePrivate - Whether to include private channels in the set.
        Returns:
        A Collection of all Channel objects.

      • getChannels

        List<IChannel> getChannels()
        Gets a set of all channels visible to the bot user.
        Returns:
        A Collection of all non-private Channel objects.

      • getChannelByID

        IChannel getChannelByID(String channelID)
        Gets a channel by its unique id.
        Parameters:
        channelID - The id of the desired channel.
        Returns:
        The Channel object with the provided id.

      • getVoiceChannels

        List<IVoiceChannel> getVoiceChannels()
        Gets a set of all voice channels visible to the bot user.
        Returns:
        A Collection of all VoiceChannel objects.

      • getVoiceChannelByID

        Parameters:
        id - The voice channel id.
        Returns:
        The voice channel (or null if not found).

      • getMessages

        Returns:

      • getMessages

        List<IMessage> getMessages()
        This gets all messages stored internally by the bot (including from private channels).
        Returns:
        A collection of all messages.

      • getMessageByID

        IMessage getMessageByID(String messageID)
        This attempts to search all guilds/private channels for a message.
        Parameters:
        messageID - The message id of the message to find.
        Returns:
        The message or null if not found.
